hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select eoor.eoor_order_no, eoor.eoor_is_delivery_reservation, eoor.eoor_delivery_reservation_flag, eoor.eoor_is_picking_reservation, eoor.eoor_picking_reservation_flag from eo_order eoor where 1 = 1 <<and eoor.eoor_order_no in (:orderNos)>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
